entry.name: loader
entry.title: Loader Widget
entry.desc: Handles the task of displaying the loading dialog when jQuery Mobile pulls in content via AJAX.

option.name: html
option.example-value:
"

is loading for you ...

"
option.desc: If this is set to a non empty string value, it will be used to replace the entirety of the loader's inner html.

option.name: text
option.desc: Sets the text of the message.

option.name: textonly
option.desc: If true, the "spinner" image will be hidden when the message is shown.

option.name: textVisible
option.desc: If true, the text value will be used under the spinner.

event.name: create
event.desc: Triggered when a loader widget is created.

method.name: checkLoaderPosition
method.desc: Check position of loader to see if it appears to be "fixed" to center.

method.name: fakeFixLoader
method.desc: For non-fixed supporting browsers. Position at y center (if scrollTop supported), above the activeBtn (if defined), or just 100px from top.

method.name: loading
method.desc: Show or hide the loader message, which is configurable via $.mobile.loader prototype options as described in the widget docs or can be controlled via a params object.
